forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy skies with scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Partly cloudy skies after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in late. Thunder possible. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 39F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Thunder possible. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Thunder possible. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 67F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 21C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 71F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 21C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 71F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 22C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 74F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 71F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
